articles.title: Anti-pasteurization crowd reaffirms love of raw milk despite bird flu outbreak - Ars Technica
articles.description: Raw milk fans called warnings "fear mongering," despite 52% fatality rate in humans.
articles.content:

94
To drink raw milk at any time is to flirt with dangerous germs. But, amid an unprecedented outbreak of H5N1 bird flu in US dairy cows,… [+5589 chars]

articles.title: Not Just Auroras: Here's the Tech That Got Hit by This Weekend's Solar Storm - Gizmodo

articles.content: On Friday, Earth was hit by the strongest geomagnetic storm in 20 years. Intense solar activity sent bursts of radiation toward Earth, causing fluctuations in the upper atmosphere that led to disrupt… [+4306 chars]
